Description:
KENNINGTON SHINES
This stand alone Solid Brick unit has so many delightful features; inside and out
From the front entry into the lounge you are able to appreciate the spaciousness of the rooms, dining and kitchen with open plan from the lounge.
Lovely east facing window in the lounge that lets in the early morning sun, just before you take a stroll around the Kennington Lake.
Two large bedrooms with Built in robes, good bathroom with the advantage of having a separate bath, shower and vanity.
Very private rear garden with access to shed and single carport which is entranced off Strathdale Crescent
We are so lucky to have this unit for sale as the presentation by the current tenant is First Class;she has been here for a very long time and loves the unit as if it were her own.
For investment purposes this unit stands out, for quality, spaciousness and very convenient position for future gain and long term tenancy.
Walk around the lovely surrounds of the Kennington Reserve, enjoy the local sporting facilities, the shopping, the school.....and then there's a bus stop across the road.
Helen Ashby : 0408 42 5566

Description:
Position Plus, Walk To Town
Designer refurbished, this impressive compact 2 bdrm unit is bound to impress. Fabulous kitchen with electric under bench oven and gas hot plates and ample cupboard space. 3 piece bathroom and sep. laundry. Large walk in linen/ storage cupboard. Currently leased until 9/5/13 with a rental income of $245 p.w. Front unit overlooking the Kennington oval. Off street parking. Fantastic location, so close to everything.

Description:
Impressive Two Storey Residence Overlooking Kennington Reservoir
This property has so much to offer
- Water
Views - Craftsman Built - Prime location close to shops, primary schools, public transport and parklands and a versatile design.
Accommodation comprises downstairs Entrance, Lounge with O.F.P. Dining Room, well appointed Kitchen with granite benchtops, Family Room, Bedroom, Bathroom and Laundry whilst upstairs there are 2 more Bedrooms with robes, family Bathroom with spa and the main Bedroom Suite with parents retreat, study, ensuite and walk in robe.
Features include zoned elec. floor heating, gas heater, ducted evap cooling and R/C airconditioner.
Quality fittings and fixtures, double lock-up garage/workshop with direct access to the house, private rear courtyard with BBQ and landscaped gardens complete the picture.
THIS PROPERTY OFFERS EXCEPTIONAL VALUE - PRICED WELL BELOW REPLACEMENT COST. “DON'T MISS THIS ONE”.
Leonie Butler : 0417 521 661

Description:
Prime Location in the Heart of Kennington
Located in one of Bendigo's most sort after locations you will find this excellent Californian Bungalow style family home. This home offer enormous potential and is a renovator's delight! Or why not develop this large block - it truly does make the possibilities endless! This three bedroom home offers beautiful polished floor boards in two of the bedrooms and main living areas, lounge with ceiling fan, split system heating and cooling, and gas heater with beautiful timber features surrounding from the original fire place mantle with the added features of beautiful ornate ceilings and timber skirts and picture rails throughout this home, it really does give this home character. Separate Dining and Kitchen, which leads out to a sun-room and laundry. The bathroom has been partially renovated with shower and vanity. The backyard of the property has a large enclosed yard with side access, shed, a small paved undercover area, and a beautiful large establish tree offering plenty of shade. A front verandah, with established garden, gives this home privacy. Located within a stones through away from Strath Village, schools and the Kennington Reserve this truly is your opportunity to own in this prime location.
Insights: 74 other 3 bedroom house in KENNINGTON have recently been sold.

Description:
FOUR BEDROOMS PLUS STUDY
Beautiful presentation of this delightful home stands out as one of our best properties on offer. The owners have certainly spared no expense in the quality of the fittings and fixtures. Four major bedrooms, plus study, ensuite and family bathroom for the kids, both bathrooms beautifully appointed. Formal lounge with dining area. Kitchen just fitted with new oven, hot plates and rangehood. Great use of bench space and tons of storage. Family room opens directly onto the covered patio area. Professionally landscaped garden with delightful grassed sitting area. Shed here is complemented by the double garaging and double carport. Short walk to University and Strath Village Shopping Centre. Quiet Court situation, very family friendly.

Description:
INVEST IN LOCATION
This is undoubtedly an enviable position, in one of Bendigo's most sought after suburbs. Located so close to Schools & just over two kilometres to the heart of Bendigo CBD, and five minutes drive to La Trobe University. This property is sure to impress! The quiet position will suit first home buyers, investors or maybe you are looking to downsize? The modern & immaculately presented brick veneer home comprises of two large bedrooms, both with built in robes. The lounge / kitchen & meals area is large, open & inviting. The kitchen offers all modern conveniences, with gas cook top & oven, heating and cooling offers year round comfort with gas wall furnace & air conditioning. You have a carport with access through to a workshop / storage shed. The outside courtyard / garden is much larger than the average & offers plenty of privacy. This is a must inspect!

Description:
Immaculate 2 Bedroom Home in Sought After Location
This is undoubtedly an enviable position, in one of Bendigo's most sought after suburbs. Located a stone's throw away from Kennington primary school & just over 1 kilometre to Kennington Reservoir, a short walk to LaTrobe University and a short drive to the CBD. This property is sure to impress! The quiet and convenient position will suit first home buyers, investors and retirees alike. Solid and immaculately presented, this brick veneer home comprises of two bedrooms, both with built in robes. The lounge/kitchen & meals area is open and inviting. The kitchen offers gas appliances, and cupboard space is in abundance. Split system heating and cooling offers year round comfort with an additional heater. Quality fittings and decorative cornices have this home looking stylish.
There is a single lock-up garage with access through to the secure backyard. The outside pergola and garden is much larger than the average & offers plenty of privacy. No body corporate fees as this unit is on its own title! This is a must to inspect!
Nekti Tzouroutis : 0412 242 321

Description:
CHARM, CHARACTER and POTENTIAL
Perfectly positioned on a prominent corner allotment in one of Bendigo's most sought after locations is this charming Victorian that combines period class with the potential to extend or develop (STCA).
Within walking distance to the Bendigo CBD, the property boast classic period features and offers 3 spacious bedrooms with built in robes, generous lounge and a dining area with French doors leading to a decked outdoor entertaining space.
Ducted Gas Heating and Evaporative cooling provide climate control while the original open fire places are present throughout.
Access to the rear yard from Mundy Street provides ample space for caravan or trailer and provides subdivision opportunities (STCA).
Outside features an automated sprinkler system, carport and 6m x 6m shed/garage with power and concrete floor.
Close to all amenities and with Kennington Sports Ground nearby this home is ideally located and is a must see.
Prior offers considered!

Bendigo CBD is on your doorstep!
Well positioned to all Bendigo has to offer this renovated, character filled home, offers a fantastic location, low maintenance living and lots of charm throughout.
No need to drive to the shops, just leave your car in the single garage and walk everywhere. Presenting 2 large bedrooms plus study or dressing room, a centrally located bathroom, polished timber floors, 9ft ceilings, large lounge room, gas heating, split system cooling and updated kitchen.
The rear yard provides the home owner with plenty of room including a 7.6 x 4m shed and side access to store boat/caravan and trailer.
This is where you want to be - don't miss it!

Description:
CONTEMPORARY LIVING WITH A HERITAGE TOUCH...
Blending elegantly into the heritage streetscape, this 3BR residence cleverly combines traditional charm with contemporary living. Within easy walking distance to the Strathdale shopping centres and the Bendigo CBD, the home has been beautifully restored and has many period features. Behind the quaint period-style facade is a sleek interior with quality fittings. Polished flooring creates a luxurious and inviting interior. The master bedroom has an ensuite that will be the envy of all your friends, ducted gas heating and reverse cycle cooling with provide comfort all year round.
At the rear of the home is a great entertaining hub where the practical chef's kitchen including breakfast bar, living area and alfresco combine to create an entertainers paradise. Stunning bi-fold doors open onto a large hardwood deck surrounded by an easy-care garden in a private setting. The yard features a carport with attached garage and separate work shop.
This home is packed full of beautiful features with nothing left to do but move in and enjoy the location with everything you need on your door step.
Cameron Tweed : 0400 869 698

Description:
Stylish & Timeless Urban Oasis
Few houses enjoy such a privileged position as this one.
The blue ribbon location enhances the meaning of convenience with Strath shopping centres, supermarket, schools, university, public transport, pool, gyms and more all within easy walking distance.
The tri-level residence was a striking architectural accomplishment when built and thanks to faithful maintenance and elegant updating, it is still a modern marvel twenty plus years later.
From the bold front facade, enter the lower level to a spacious home-office complete with built-in desks, a multi-purpose room perfect all that hard-to-store gear, or use it as home gym plus access to the double garage.
The first level is home to a spacious formal lounge with a wall of east-facing windows overlooking the lush rear garden while the next level opens to the formal dining area and main bedroom with its private balcony, walk-through robe and ensuite.
The modern kitchen features a walk-in-pantry, quality stainless steel appliances and loads of granite-overlaid benches adjoining the casual meals area and spacious family living room with built-in entertainment unit and seamless connection to a fabulous outdoor living area.
Two more robed bedrooms, the family bathroom and laundry are found in a separate zone.
The perfect fusion of lifestyle and leisure awaits in the picturesque private rear garden with in ground pool complete with rock waterfall, a concealed service area with fruit trees, Dog enclosure, rainwater tank and access to under-house storage and workshop.
Beautiful established trees and shrubbery surround meandering lawn areas creating an aura of privacy, relaxed serenity and enduring style.
Take your life to another level in this immaculate property in a faultless position.
Insights: 17 Allison Street, Kennington VIC 3550 was last sold in 2013 and 74 other 3 bedroom house in Kennington have recently been sold.

Description:
Surprisingly Spacious Family Home- Ideal for 2 Families
Set on an allotment of impressive dimensions (approx 1200 sq m) is this huge residence of approx 36 squares of living. Catering for the large / extended family or perhaps student accommodation featuring 5 Bedrooms, multiple living spaces including upstairs family room. Fully appointed kitchen with generous sized meals area. Two bathrooms, two laundries plus the added bonus of a 2nd kitchenette and dining area. The home is currently set up as 2 separate units but could easily be adapted back to one very large home. Outdoors features a five car carport, 1/2 sized tennis court and the space for possible subdivision (STCA). Close to Strath Village, Catholic and Primary schools, medical centre and transport at the door. Premier location and offering magnificent views over Bendigo.

Description:
Great Home Close To Town
Situated on Lowndes Street, only minutes from the heart of Bendigo, Strath Village shopping centre and Kennington primary school is this great 3 bedroom weather board home. Quality renovated kitchen incl. gas hot plates, electric wall oven, dishwasher and great cupboard space. All Bedrooms with BIR's, upgraded bathroom, ducted gas heating and evaporative cooling throughout. There is a double garage at the rear, a new wooden deck under the pergola and a good size backyard. Don't miss your chance to own this beautiful property in a fantastic location.
Insights: 74 other 3 bedroom house in Kennington have recently been sold.

Description:
Surprisingly Spacious Family Home- Ideal for 2 Families
Set on an allotment of impressive dimensions (approx 1200 sq m) is this huge residence of approx 36 squares of living. Catering for the large / extended family or perhaps student accommodation featuring 5 Bedrooms, multiple living spaces including upstairs family room. Fully appointed kitchen with generous sized meals area. Two bathrooms, two laundries plus the added bonus of a 2nd kitchenette and dining area. The home is currently set up as 2 separate units but could easily be adapted back to one very large home. Outdoors features a five car carport, 1/2 sized tennis court and the space for possible subdivision (STCA). Close to Strath Village, Catholic and Primary schools, medical centre and transport at the door. Premier location and offering magnificent views over Bendigo.
Jenny Donaldson : 0409 484 391

Description:
THE RIGHT LOCATION
You will find it difficult to find a home in any better location than this beautiful 3 bedroom weatherboard situated close to schools, shops and also the CBD. As soon as you step inside you will be amazed at the transformation that has been undertaken. Honey coloured Polished floor boards ooze character whilst the renovated kitchen is a treat for us all. The large newly carpeted lounge / family room enjoys an abundance of light filtering through in the winter afternoons. The ability to step out directly onto the timber decking ensures summer BBQ's are enjoyed by the whole family while watching the children play in the family sized backyard. Ducted evap cooling and a gas heater ensure year round comfort.
Move your furniture in and enjoy the lifestyle on offer when you say that you now live in “Kennington”.
Andrew Pearce : 0419 544
251
